summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons Special Housing Unit (SHU) records for inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering dates from July 11, 2019, to August 9, 2019. It logs his daily status, meals, showers, exercise, out-of-cell time, and medical checks, consistently noting he voiced no medical complaints. The file also includes unrelated administrative forms for body alarm testing and daily fire/security inspections.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the Special Housing Unit records, detailing his daily incarceration routine and health status at the MCC New York.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was held in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York in July and August 2019.
The logs show daily entries for meals, showers, exercise, and out-of-cell time, with consistent notes that he 'voiced no medical complaints'.
Epstein was moved between at least three different SHU cells: Z05-124LAD, Z04-206LAD, and H01-001L during this period.
The document includes standard prison administrative forms unrelated to Epstein's specific case, such as body alarm testing and daily security inspection checklists.
